Class HTTPConstants

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.server.constants.HTTPConstants
public final class HTTPConstants extends Object
HTTP client configuration constants. Default timeout values, buffer sizes, and connection pool settings for HTTP clients used throughout JScience.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    ACCEPT_JSON
    Accept header for JSON responses.
    static final Duration
    CONNECT_TIMEOUT
    Default connection timeout for HTTP requests.
    static final String
    CONTENT_TYPE_JSON
    Content-Type header for JSON requests.
    static final int
    DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE
    Default buffer size for reading HTTP responses (8KB).
    static final Duration
    KEEP_ALIVE_DURATION
    Connection keep-alive duration.
    static final int
    LARGE_BUFFER_SIZE
    Large buffer size for streaming operations (64KB).
    static final int
    MAX_CONNECTIONS
    Maximum number of concurrent connections in the pool.
    static final Duration
    MAX_IDLE_TIME
    Maximum idle time for pooled connections.
    static final int
    MAX_RESPONSE_SIZE
    Maximum response body size to read into memory (10MB).
    static final int
    MAX_RETRIES
    Maximum number of retry attempts for failed requests.
    static final Duration
    MLFLOW_TIMEOUT
    Timeout for MLflow server operations (can be longer).
    static final Duration
    OIDC_DISCOVERY_TIMEOUT
    Timeout for OIDC provider discovery.
    static final Duration
    RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW
    Time window for rate limiting.
    static final Duration
    REQUEST_TIMEOUT
    Default read/request timeout for HTTP requests.
    static final Duration
    RETRY_BASE_DELAY
    Base delay between retry attempts (exponential backoff).
    static final Duration
    RETRY_MAX_DELAY
    Maximum delay between retries.
    static final String
    USER_AGENT
    User-Agent header value for JScience HTTP clients.
    static final int
    WORLD_BANK_RATE_LIMIT
    World Bank API rate limit (requests per minute).
    static final Duration
    WORLD_BANK_TIMEOUT
    Timeout for World Bank API requests.

      public static final int WORLD_BANK_RATE_LIMIT
      World Bank API rate limit (requests per minute). Official limit is 120 req/min, we use 100 to be safe.
